Html

select标签下的选项添加分类

Post By [ 2016-10-14 00:00:00 +0800 ]

<select multiple="multiple">   
	<optgroup label="On-line2">
		<option>A</option>
		<option>B</option>
		<option>C</option>
	</optgroup>
	<optgroup label="On-line2">
		<option>hha</option>
		<option>sa</option>
		<option>ds</option>
	</optgroup>
</select>
